text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kajwawechete Isa mwanache jwa Maryam kuti: “E jenumanja wanache wa Israila! Chisimu une ni Ntenga jwa Allah kukwenu jungwitichisya yaili paujo pangu yakuumila mu Taurat, soni ni ngutagulila ya abali jakusengwasya ja Ntenga jwatachiika panyuma pangu lina lyakwe Ahmadu.” Nambo ndema jajwaichilile ni ilosyo yakuonechela papaswela, watite: “Awu ni usawi wakuonechela.”
